basics.name: Sara Joseph
basics.summary: +7 years of experience as Frontend Developer, creating intuitive and functional user interfaces for clients from different sectors. I focus on creating scalable and sustainable solutions that bring value to both users and companies. I am motivated to work on innovative projects that combine creativity and technology.

work.summary: Development of interactive calculators for a client in the Danish energy sector. These tools allowed users to estimate the benefits of adopting energy solutions and helped the client promote its services with clear and personalized data.

I was involved in the development of websites for the e-retail sector, working mainly with Danone. Depending on the needs of the marketing campaigns, I created new pages or adjusted existing ones, ensuring that they reflected the communication needs and offered an optimized user experience. I worked directly with the marketing team, ensuring that everything was aligned with what was to be communicated, which allowed us to launch campaigns within tight timeframes and offer a good user experience.

I developed interactive presentations using JavaScript to showcase products for clients in the healthcare sector. These presentations allowed clients to communicate the features of their products in a visual and dynamic way, solving the need to transmit technical information in an attractive way. I also developed email marketing campaigns using Veeva CRM, facilitating the promotion of products and services.

I participated in the development and design of the website, the intranet and the B2B platform for managing distributors and orders. I implemented solutions that improved the user experience and strengthened the brand's visual identity. These platforms allowed the automation of internal processes and facilitated communication between the company and its distributors, achieving greater operational efficiency.

education.course: Advanced Professional Qualification in Web Applications Development (equivalent to HNC)
education.degree: Superior Technique in Web Application Development
General Certificate of Education in Arts

projects.name: Cotravelers
projects.description: Project created as a final project idea for the React.JS specialization course I took at IT Academy Barcelona Activa. It is an application to find cotravelers, joining trips created by other travelers or creating trips for other travelers to join.
projects.stack: Vite, ReactJS, Typescript, ChakraUI, Tailwind, Zustand, ESLint, Firebase

projects.name: Bocados
projects.description: Fictional restaurant website designed as a showcase for potential clients. It features a menu of dishes and drinks, restaurant information, and a contact form, providing an intuitive and engaging experience.
projects.stack: Vite, ReactJS, Typescript, Sass, ESLint, Firebase
